cult.name: The White Church
entries: The White Church is probably the most widespread religious group in Nuaria. It taches and promotes the teachings written in the White Book.
Typical clerics are those from the light domain and the life domain.

cult.name: The Knights of the White Flame
entries: The Knights of the White Flame.
Typical paladins are those of the Oath of Redemption.

cult.name: Brotherhood of the Fading Light
entries: Followers of Alasia whose sacred text are the Glooming Letters. They follow the Duty of Dark equality.
Typical clerics are those of the Treachery Domain/Fading light domain.

cult.name: Order of the Final Rest
entries: Followers of Alasia that make sure that the dead rest. Little is known from them. Very secretive.
Typical clerics are those from the grave domain.

cult.name: Children of the Wilds
entries: Typical clerics are those of the Treachery Domain/Fading light domain.
